President Bush administration, Donald Rumsfeld was at odds with Donald Rumsfeld of State Colin Powell about Iraq. The differences weren't personal, Donald Rumsfeld said. He recalled receiving a book that Henry Kissinger had written, with the inscription, To an occasional adversary and a permanent friend. history to throw for at least 300 yards and four touchdowns AND rush for at least 50 yards and two scores in leading the Philadelphia Eagles to a 59-28 demolition of the Washington Redskins at Fed-Ex Field. I've had some great games in my day, Michael Vick told reporters. ''But I don't think I've had one quite like this one.'' I have forgiven Michael Vick . From this day forward, I will no longer bash Michael Vick on my Facebook page or in this column. There will be no more references to ''scum'' or a piece of trash who shouldn't be given the privilege of playing quarterback in the NFL. Seriously, I am trying to learn the true meaning of the word ''forgiveness'' and sometimes that means letting things go. This does not mean I condone his felonious acts of animal cruelty

I-Vt., had a similar response and called on the United States to support a transition to democracy. ''After 30 years of autocratic rule, Hosni Mubarak is gone,'' Sen. Bernie Sanders said in a statement. That is extraordinary news and a real testament to the incredible courage of millions of people in that country who put their lives on the line in the fight for democracy. The goal now, which will not be easy, is for Egypt to make the transition to a democratic government with real legal safeguards. The United States must play an active role in helping the democratic forces in Egypt accomplish that. The Egyptian military, although highly respected by the nation's people, lives considerably better than the average Egyptian- a disparity the country will have to address as it moves forward, Patrick Leahy said.

Google co-founder Sergey Brin , who will also focus on strategic projects and new products. '' Eric Schmidt has clearly done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade,'' Page said in a written statement. The results speak for themselves. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly. Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him. His advice and efforts will be invaluable to me as I start in this new role. Google still has such incredible opportunity-- we are only at the beginning and I can't wait to get started. The changes takes effect April 4. Google Thursday reported fourth-quarter revenues of$ 8.44 billion, an increase of 26 percent compared to the fourth quarter of 2009-- topping analysts expectations.

Max Clifford , the well-known public relations guru who reportedly received a lucrative settlement when his phones were tapped, said that Edmonson's firing and Andy Coulson 's resignation was like a volcano that is starting to erupt. ''There will be huge explosions all over Fleet Street if police get to the truth,'' he told the BBC. User comments are not being accepted on this article.

David Letterman then asks her what she does in her free time and Betty White says, Oh, I like to do most anything. Play with animals, mostly. And vodka's kind of a hobby. So David Letterman reaches down from behind the desk and produces a bottle of Grey Goose, to which Betty White laughs heartily. They share some vodka, then she does a classic spit-take.
